post:
I have a VPS with Chicago VPS in Chicago that I no longer need. It is paid for until November 9 2013.

Basic Specs:

OpenVZ 2048MB RAM,100GB HDD,100Mbps Port, 5TB Bandwidth,3 IPv4 Address and 4 core of Intel Xeon CPU E5620 @ 2.40GHz)

Renewal cost is $5 per 1 months after Nov 9.

You can have this VPS for just $7 total. I accept payment via paypal

PM me if you want it.
